system.name: Example GenAI Assistant
system.notes: Sample dossier for demonstrating NIST AI 600-1 style coverage checks.

genai_profile.DATA_PROVENANCE_SUMMARY: High-level provenance summary: data types, licensing posture, exclusions, and known gaps (no raw training data included here).
genai_profile.ADAPTATION_FINETUNING_NOTES: Model adaptation notes: fine-tuning approach, training objectives, and any post-training alignment methods (RLHF/RLAIF) at a high level.
genai_profile.EVALUATION_EVIDENCE: Evaluation evidence: red-team summary, robustness checks, error analysis, and known failure modes; include uncertainty/limits.
genai_profile.MISUSE_MONITORING: Misuse monitoring plan: abuse taxonomy, detection/response, rate limiting, incident logging, and escalation pathway.
genai_profile.DISCLOSURE: Disclosure: user-facing notice of AI involvement, limitations, uncertainty, and reporting channel for harms.
